text: Mba gumgi gu mbigi mba suambarar ana mbuim, Zisas mbaram khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde zumgum khara muuŋgip nan vhunama sɨv suanga. Nde khaŋ suanga, ‘Ndu rɨɨi phenan ŋgari guma, ndu fharav nduara won fhavan muuŋgirim ana nzerari.’ Nde maaŋ suaŋv khaŋ suanga, ‘Nza ndu Kaperneaman ka muuŋgi bigi, nza nta mbararagi. Maaŋ muuŋgip, ndu ntigem won ŋgu nɨɨŋgera, ndu mba khesharigi bigira muuŋgiri.’ ” 4.23 Kha rɨɨi phenan ŋgari guma, ana nduara won rɨmrɨman muuŋgip won kurav nzerarga ne nɨɨeŋ, khaŋ muuŋgi. Guma the khaŋ suanga, ana ŋaarar then muunga tuktɨgi. Ana mba ŋaara ana za kha gumgi gu mbigi rɨmgi nɨman ana muuŋri. Ana maaŋ muunga, mbe ana khothɨgɨrga. Kha kameŋ ves 18-19 Zisas Fhe Bakɨme ana nɨɨŋgi ŋaara bakɨme nzuai. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, Zisas kha ndɨkndɨga mbui, kha gumgi gu mbigi kha ndɨkndɨga mbui. Kha gumgi gu mbigi khaŋ suanga, mbe fharav ana ganɨrim, ana mirikorir muuŋgirga, mbe ana buni khothɨgɨrga.
